description: Supply Arrangement - W8485-184741 Series - Aviation Replacement Parts
full_summary:
# Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC138 Twin Otter

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a supply arrangement for replacement parts for the CC138 Twin Otter aircraft.

## Procurement Overview
- **Procurement Reference**: cb-7826-92680347
- **Procurement Number**: W8485-247711/A
- **Publication Date**: 2023-08-03
- **Closing Date**: 2023-08-09T14:00:00

## Tender Description
The requirement is for the acquisition of 6 items for the CC138 Twin Otter aircraft. This is a request for proposal (RFP) open only to qualified supply arrangement (SA) holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series.

### Invited Suppliers
The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

- Mills/Sterling Aerospace Inc.
- Pratt & Whitney Canada Corp.
- Simex Defence Inc.
- Tower Aerospace Inc.
- Genaire Limited
- Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.
- Canada West Avionics
- Honeywell Ltd
- TSL Aerospace Technologies
- AllClear Aerospace and Defence Inc.

### Contact Information
- **Contracting Officer**: MCpl PJ Oakley
- **Email**: [PJ.Oakley@forces.gc.ca](mailto:PJ.Oakley@forces.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: (819) 939-9121

### Proposed Terms
- **Evaluation Method**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Work under the following trade agreements:
    - Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    - Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    - Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    - Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    - Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    - Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Delivery and Regions
- **Delivery Location**: Edmonton, Alberta, Canada
- **Based on the solicitation notice, it is recommended to review carefully before proceeding further.** 

Note that some information (e.g. notice URL, attachment) was not included in the provided snippet. Also I kept most of the details from the original snippet, aiming at maximizing transfer of information while maintaining the requested rewording and format. 

Expect you to ensure it is instead read throughout before applying for the tender. Feedback is more than welcome.​            ​
